thread.section_title: LD Mountain Centre Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LD Mountain Centre | www.ldmountaincentre.com | 8 of 110
thread.title: CME
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by CME

author: CME
title: CME
text:
I was looking for a specific backpack mount for my GoPro for an upcoming ski trip, they had stock, it was at a great price when compared to other sites. Usage of the site was very easy, well laid out, plenty of functionality so that you could find what you're looking for.
Whilst at the site I had a look at some of their other products, again I found a large range of stock and good prices. I have book marked the site for future outdoor products.
There was a slight problem with the delivery, Royal Mail failed to deliver and returned the product to the store, when I contacted them the quickly sent out a replacement items which arrived promptly.
